v a p o r w a v e

For the past few weeks I’ve been listening to various vaporwave artists on Soundcloud, Bandcamp and Youtube. Nice discovery. Just to name a few: Home - Resonance, MACINTOSH PLUS - リサフランク420 / 現代のコンピュー, Saint Pepsi - Private Caller.

Especially the last one, there is a comment on Youtube that describes it very well:

This feels like living in a postapocalypctic neon cyberpunk future locked inside a garage while on drugs and watching vhs tapes over and over again.

You know, A E S T H E T I C S.
